def magic_sum(arr):
    return arr and sum(x for x in arr if x%2 and '3' in str(x)) or 0

def magic_sum(arr):
    return sum(i for i in arr if (i%2==1 and '3' in str(i))) if arr else 0

def magic_sum(arr):
    return sum(n for n in arr if n%2 and '3'in str(n)) if arr else 0
magic_sum=lambda a:sum(n%2*n*('3'in str(n))for n in a or[])

def magic_sum(arr):
    return sum(i for i in arr if '3' in str(i) and i%2) if arr else 0

def magic_sum(arr):
    return 0 if not arr else sum(x for x in arr if x % 2 and '3' in str(x))

def magic_sum(arr):
    return sum(v for v in arr if "3" in set(str(v)) and v%2) if arr else 0
